rule: Each model name in the array should be a string enclosed in double quotes '"'.
input: Abstract: Emphasizing the importance of robust algorithms.
validityText:
The input starts with "Abstract: ", which complies with the first part of the specification. The text following this prefix is "Emphasizing the importance of robust algorithms.", which represents an abstract of a machine learning paper. The specification allows for abstracts that may or may not mention model names, so the absence of specific model names is acceptable. The text is in English, thereby meeting the language requirement specified. There is nothing in the content that contradicts the input specification.

No violation.
OK
